Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
@Program needs to handle special I/O-Files formated as CSV files, where
alpha strings are between "" (f.e. "Test") and numeric values does not
between "". It's possible that the delimeter ; uses for CSV-Files as
delimeter, is part of an alpha string (f.e. "Test;PL") and then it's
not a delimeter for CSV-Files.
It's also possible that an alpha string does not starts with ", then it's an
extended part of payment description (Field_12).
@This program only handled strings for I/O-Files from Poland "HANDLOWY",
it's to difficult to build an global program which handles CSV-Files where
the ; is part of an alpha string
-- Prepare Field_1 (could be started with " or without ", then it's an extended
-- description part
-- New payment starts, then start char = ", the second char has to be <> ;, in
-- this case it's the " is the end doublequote of the description part of the
-- prev row
-- Cut the extraceted string and also the " and the following ;
-- An extended part of the description was detected, without any delimeters
-- An extended part of the description was detected, with " at the end of the
-- first string, which has to be wrapped
-- Cut the extraceted string and also the " and the following ;
-- The end doublequote of an extended part of the description was detected
-- as first char, then the second char has to ;. In this case there is no
-- remaing description part which has to be extracted.
-- Prepare Field_2 - Field_7 (alpha fields, between ", f.e "Test")
-- Prepare Field_8 - Field_9 (numeric fields, without ", f.e 12345,45)
-- Prepare Field_10 - Field_13 (alpha fields, between ", f.e "Test")
-- Delete leading "
-- Char which has to be extracted was detected
-- Cut the extraceted string and also the " and the following ;
-- No char which has to be extracted was detected
-- Cut " and also the " and the following ;
-- If the last field = Field_12 (description) and ended without "
-- Set input string to blank, end of string reached
-- Cut the extraceted string and also the ;
